interrupt/interrupt.h¶

outb(port, value)¶
Paramètres

  • port – port number to be write

  • value – value to be write on port. sizeof(value) = 1o

in(port)¶

/** :param port: port number to be read :return: 1 o, read on port

cli¶

Enable interrupt

sti¶

Disable interrupt

EOI¶

End of interrupt signal

INT_TYPE¶

base type for interrupt

SYSCALL_TYPE¶

base type for syscall (when initialisating one of the idt descriptor)

struct Idt_¶

Interrupt descriptor table structure in memory

struct IdtR_¶

Interrupt descriptor table pointer descriptor

IDT_LIM¶

IDT size

IDT_BASE¶

IDT adress

void initIdtDescriptor(u32 offset, u16 selector, u16 type, Idt *idt)¶

Initialisate one of the descriptor located in the idt : :param offset: Adress of the function to be call when an interrupt is emit :param selector: see intel doc :param type: See intel doc :param idt: Pointer of the idt to be initialisate

void _sysCalls(int num_appel)¶

Interrupt part for pic8259A

PIC_M_0¶

pic maître sur 0x20 et 0x21

PIC_E_0¶

pic esclave sur 0xA0 et 0xA1
